Nurgle (Age of Sigmar) [3,640pts]

  • **Pitched Battle** 2,000 (Chaos - Nurgle) [3,640pts]

    Rules: At the Double, Forward to Victory, Inspiring Presence

    • Uncategorised

      • Feculent Gnarlmaw

        Categories: SCENERY, FECULENT GNARLMAW

        Unit Abilities: Entropic Chimes, Sickness Blossoms


        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Entropic Chimes In their charge phase, NURGLE units that are within 7" of any Feculent Gnarlmaws can attempt to charge even if they ran in the same turn.
        Sickness Blossoms At the start of the hero phase, roll a dice for each unit within 3" of any Feculent Gnarlmaws. On a 4+ the unit suffers 1 mortal wound. Units with the NURGLE keyword are unaffected by this ability.

    • Leader [1,400pts]

      • Chaos Lord on Daemonic Mount [140pts]

        Selections: 1. Miasmatic Blade, 2. The Foetid Shroud, 3. Wristbands of Illusion

        Categories: CHAOS, DAEMON, MORTAL, SLAVES TO DARKNESS, HERO, CHAOS LORD ON DAEMONIC MOUNT, Leader, Artefact

        Artefact: Miasmatic Blade, The Foetid Shroud, Wristbands of Illusion, Command Abilities: The Knights of Chaos, Unit: Chaos Lord on Daemonic Mount, Unit Abilities: Chaos Runeshield, Eye of the Gods, Weapon: Cursed Warhammer, Daemonic Mount's Mighty Hooves


        Artefact Artefact Details Ref
        Miasmatic Blade Pick one of the bearer’s melee weapons to be a Miasmatic Blade. Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target the bearer.
        The Foetid Shroud Re-roll hit rolls of 6+ or more for attacks that target the bearer in the combat phase.
        Wristbands of Illusion Roll a dice each time you allocate a wound to the bearer. On a 6+ the wound is negated.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        The Knights of Chaos If a Chaos Lord on Daemonic Mount uses this ability, select a unit of CHAOS KNIGHTS, CHAOS CHARIOTS or GOREBEAST CHARIOTS from your army within 15". Until your next hero phase you can re-roll charge rolls for that unit and add 1 to any hit rolls for them in the combat phase.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Chaos Lord on Daemonic Mount 10"784+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Chaos Runeshield Roll a dice each time thi s model suffers a mortal wound. On a 5 or a 6 that mortal wound is ignored.
        Eye of the Gods Each time this model slays a MONSTER or a HERO, roll a dice. If the result if 2 or more, this model heals D3 Wounds. If this model is already at full health, increase his Wounds by 1 instead.

        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Arcane Bolt 5If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If the casting roll was 10 or more, the unit suffers D3 mortal wounds instead.
        Mystic Shield 6If successfully cast, pick a friendly unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Re-roll save rolls of 1 for that unit until your next hero phase.
        Wind of Chaos 7If successfully cast, pick a visible unit within 18". Roll a number of dice equal to the total casting roll that was rolled for this spell (for example, if Wind of Chaos was cast with a casting roll of 8, roll 8 dice). For each roll of 5, the target unit suffers one mortal wound. For each roll of 6, the target unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

        Territorial Predator You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for the Manticore's Claws and Jaws attacks if the target is a MONSTER. If the target is a unit within your army's territory, you can re-roll any failed hit rolls for these attacks.

      • Exalted Hero of Chaos [80pts]

        Selections: 2. Blade of the Thirteen Dominions, 3. Sublucus' Stenchplate, 5. Betrayer's Crown, Chaos Runeshield, Nurgle

        Categories: CHAOS, MORTAL, SLAVES TO DARKNESS, HERO, EXALTED HERO OF CHAOS, Leader, Artefact, NURGLE

        Artefact: Betrayer's Crown, Blade of the Thirteen Dominions, Sublucus' Stenchplate, Unit: Exalted Hero of Chaos, Unit Abilities: Chaos Runeshield, Glory-hungry Bladesman, Thrice-damned Dagger, Trail of Red Ruin, Weapon: Chaos Death-blades


        Artefact Artefact Details Ref
        Betrayer's Crown Once per battle, at the start of the combat phase, pick an enemy unit within 3" of the bearer that has two or more models. Roll a dice for each model in that enemy unit. For each 5+ that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
        Blade of the Thirteen Dominions Pick one of the bearer’s melee weapons to be a Blade of the Thirteen Dominions. Allocate wounds inflicted by that weapon before allocating wounds inflicted by any other attacks made by the bearer. If 1 or more wounds are inflicted on an enemy unit by that weapon, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made by that unit until the end of the phase.
        Sublucus' Stenchplate Enemy units that are within 3" of the bearer at the end of their movement phase suffer D3 mortal wounds.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Exalted Hero of Chaos 5"584+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Chaos Runeshield Roll a dice each time an Exalted Hero with a Chaos Runeshield suffers a mortal wound. On a 5 or a 6 that mortal wound is ignored.
        Glory-hungry Bladesman Add 1 to the hit rolls for an Exalted Hero of Chaos if the target is a HERO or a MONSTER.
        Thrice-damned Dagger An Exalted Hero can use his Thrice-damned Dagger at the end of a combat phase to cut the heart from one enemy HERO or MONSTER slain by his Death-blades in that phase. If he does so, he can double the number of attacks he makes with his Chaos Death-blades in the next combat phase.
        Trail of Red Ruin If an Exalted Hero of Chaos charges, he can pile in and attack two times in the following combat phase instead of only once. The second pile in move and attacks are made immediately after the first set of attacks is completed.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Chaos Death-blades Melee1"D64+3+-11

      • Gutrot Spume [140pts]

        Categories: CHAOS, MORTAL, NURGLE, ROTBRINGER, GUTROT SPUME, HERO, Leader

        Unit: Gutrot Spume, Unit Abilities: Clutching Pseudopods, Master of the Slime Fleet, Towering Arrogance, Weapon: Flailing Tentacles, Rot-pocked Axe


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Gutrot Spume 4"793+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Clutching Pseudopods At the start of the combat phase, you can pick an enemy model within 1" of Gutrot Spume. Choose a weapon carried by that model and roll a dice. On a 4+ that weapon cannot be used by that model in that combat phase.
        Master of the Slime Fleet Instead of setting up Gutrot Spume on the battlefield, you can place him and up to one unit of Putrid Blightkings to one side, and say that they are aboard his flagship. If you do so, at the end of your first movement phase, set up Gutrot Spume and the unit of Putrid Blightkings within 6" of each other, wholly within 6" of the edge of the battlefield and more than 9" from any enemy models.
        Towering Arrogance Re-roll hit rolls of 1 for Gutrot Spume if the target is a HERO. In addition, if Gutrot Spume is within 3" of an enemy HERO in the combat phase, he cannot target units that are not HEROES.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref

      • Sloppity Bilepiper, Herald of Nurgle [100pts]

        Selections: 3. The Bountiful Swarm, 4. Doppelganger Cloak, 6. The Shield of Growths

        Categories: CHAOS, DAEMON, HERO, NURGLE, PLAGUEBEARER, SLOPPITY BILEPIPER, HERALD OF NURGLE, Leader, Artefact

        Artefact: Doppelganger Cloak, The Bountiful Swarm, The Shield of Growths, Unit: Sloppity Bilepiper, Herald of Nurgle, Unit Abilities: Disease of Mirth, Disgustingly Resilient, Jolly Gutpipes, Weapon: Marotter


        Artefact Artefact Details Ref
        Doppelganger Cloak Once per battle, at the start of the combat phase, you can say that the bearer will put on the cloak. If you do so, the bearer cannot be chosen as the target of attacks made with melee weapons unless the bearer has made any attacks earlier in that phase. Malign Sorcery; Official Errata, December 2018
        The Bountiful Swarm At the start of your hero phase, pick an enemy model within 3" of the bearer and then roll a dice. If the roll is greater than that model’s Wounds characteristic, then it is slain. If a model with a Wounds characteristic of 4+ is slain by the Bountiful Swarm, before you remove the model, you can add a Beast of Nurgle to your army and set it up within 1" of the enemy model.
        The Shield of Growths You can re-roll failed save rolls for the bearer if the roll is equal to or less than the number of wounds currently allocated to the bearer.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Sloppity Bilepiper, Herald of Nurgle 4"5104+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Disease of Mirth Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of friendly NURGLE DAEMON units while they are within 7" of any Sloppity Bilepipers. In addition, subtract 1 from the Bravery characteristics of enemy units while they are within 7" of any Sloppity Bilepipers.
        Disgustingly Resilient Roll a dice each time you allocate a wound or mortal wound to this model. On a 5+ the wound is negated.
        Jolly Gutpipes Re-roll failed charge rolls and hit rolls of 1 for friendly Nurglings and GREAT UNCLEAN ONE units while they are within 7" of any Sloppity Bilepipers.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Marotter Melee1"44+3+-12

      • Battalion: Blight Cyst [480pts]

        Selections: Blight Cyst [200pts], Harbinger of Decay [160pts], Sorcerer [120pts]

        Categories: Battalion, CHAOS, MORTAL, NURGLE, ROTBRINGER, HERO, SORCERER, WIZARD, Leader, DAEMON, HARBINGER OF DECAY

        Battalion Abilities: Blights on the Landscape, Endless Bounty, Supremely Blighted Weapons, Command Trait: Morbid Vigour, Magic: Sorcerer, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, Stream of Corruption, Unit: Harbinger of Decay, Sorcerer, Unit Abilities: Blessed with Vitality, Rotsword, Soulbound Shield, Weapon: Daemonic Mount's Flyblown Bite, Plague Scythe, Rotwood Staff


        Battalion Abilities Battalion Ability Details Ref
        Blights on the Landscape In the combat phase, enemy units do not receive any benefits for being in cover against attacks made by this battalion.
        Endless Bounty The Munificent Bounty ability of this battalion’s Lord of Blights affects all units from this battalion that are within 3" of him at the start of your shooting phase, instead of only one unit.
        Supremely Blighted Weapons The Blighted Weapons used by the Putrid Blightkings in this battalion have a Rend characteristic of ‘-1’.
        Command Trait Command Trait Details Ref
        Morbid Vigour You can use this command ability in your hero phase. If you do, then until your next hero phase roll a dice each time you allocate a wound or mortal wound to a friendly NURGLE MORTAL unit while they are within 7" of this model. On a 5+ the wound is negated. The same unit cannot benefit from this command ability more than once in the same phase.
        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known Ref
        Sorcerer 1/1Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield and Stream of Corruption.
        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Arcane Bolt 5If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If the casting roll was 10 or more, the unit suffers D3 mortal wounds instead.
        Mystic Shield 6If successfully cast, pick a friendly unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Re-roll save rolls of 1 for that unit until your next hero phase.
        Stream of Corruption 6If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit that is within 7" of the caster and visible to them. That unit suffers 3 mortal wounds.

        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Blessed with Vitality Roll a dice each time this model successfully casts a spell and it is not unbound. On a 4+ you can heal 1 wound that has been allocated to this model.
        Rotsword Once per battle, at the start of your hero phase, pick an enemy HERO within 1" of this model and roll a dice. On a 2+ that HERO suffers D3 mortal wounds. On a 4+ that HERO suffers D3 mortal wounds, and each other enemy unit within 7" of that HERO suffers 1 mortal wound.

      • Battalion: Plague Cyst [200pts]

        Selections: Plague Cyst [200pts]

        Categories: Battalion

        Battalion Abilities: Horribly Contagious, Master of Slaughter


        Battalion Abilities Battalion Ability Details Ref
        Horribly Contagious In your hero phase, roll a dice for each enemy unit within 3" of any units from this battalion. On a 6+ the unit being rolled for suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Master of Slaughter Re-roll all failed hit rolls for units from this battalion that are affected by the Wanton Slaughter ability of this battalion’s Lord of Plagues, instead of only re-rolling hit rolls of 1.

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Selections: Nurgle

        Categories: Allegiance

        Battle Trait: Cycle of Corruption, Summon Daemons of Nurgle, The Garden of Nurgle


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Cycle of Corruption Roll a dice at the start of the first battle round of any battle that includes any NURGLE armies, before rolling to see who has the first turn. Refer to the table to see which stage of the Cycle of Corruption is currently taking place - this applies to all NURGLE armies. The Cycle of Corruption moves on one step at the start of each new battle round. For example, if the roll on the Cycle of Corruption table was a 5, then Nauseous Revulsion would apply in the first battle round, Rampant Disease in the second, Corrupted Regrowth in the third, and so on. The rule for the current stage applies for the duration of the battle round. Chaos Battletome: Maggotkin of Nurgle p59
        Summon Daemons of Nurgle You can summon units of NURGLE DAEMONS to the battlefield if you collect enough contagion points. At the start of each of your hero phases, you receive 3 contagion points if there are any friendly NURGLE models in your own territory, and 3 additional contagion points if there are any friendly NURGLE models in your opponent’s territory. If there are no enemy models in the same territory as friendly NURGLE models, you receive 1 extra contagion point for that territory. In addition, you receive D3 contagion points for each Feculent Gnarlmaw that has no enemy models within 3" of it. If you have 7 or more contagion points at the end of your movement phase, you can summon one or more units from the following list to the battlefield, and add them to your army. Each unit you summon costs a number of contagion points, as shown on the list, and you can only summon a unit if you have enough contagion points remaining to pay its cost. Summoned units must be set up wholly within 12" of a Feculent Gnarlmaw or a friendly NURGLE HERO, and more than 9" from any enemy models. If the summoned unit is a Feculent Gnarlmaw, it must also be set up more than 1" from any terrain features. Subtract the cost of the summoned unit from the number of contagion points you have available immediately after it has been set up.
        The Garden of Nurgle After all other terrain features are set up, but before you choose a territory or set up your army, you can set up one Feculent Gnarlmaw (pg 103) anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 1" from any other terrain feature. If both players can set up a Feculent Gnarlmaw, each player rolls a dice, rolling again in the case of a tie, and whoever rolls higher can choose the order in which the Feculent Gnarlmaws are set up.

    • Malign Sorcery [100pts]

      • Endless Spell: Emerald Lifeswarm [50pts]

        Categories: ENDLESS SPELL, EMERALD LIFESWORM, GHYRAN, Malign Sorcery

        Spell: Summon Emerald Lifeswarm, Unit Abilities: Bounteous Healing, Empowered by Ghyran, Fly, Predatory


        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Summon Emerald Lifeswarm 6If successfully cast, set up an Emerald Lifeswarm model wholly within 15" of the caster.
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Bounteous Healing After this model is set up or after it has moved, pick 1 unit within 1" of it. You can either heal D3 wounds that have been allocated to that unit or, if no wounds are currently allocated to the unit, you may return a number of slain models to it that have a combined Wounds characteristic equal to or less than the roll of a D3.
        Empowered by Ghyran If your battle is taking place in the Realm of Life, roll a D6 to determine the number of wounds healed or wounds worth of slain models returned by the Emerald Lifeswarm’s Bounteous Healing ability.
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Predatory An Emerald Lifeswarm is a predatory endless spell. Emerald Lifeswarms can move up to 10" and can fly.

      • Endless Spell: Purple Sun of Shyish [50pts]

        Categories: ENDLESS SPELL, PURPLE SUN OF SHYISH, SHYISH, Malign Sorcery

        Spell: Summon Purple Sun of Shyish, Unit Abilities: Empowered by Shyish, End Given Form, Fly, Predatory, Swirling Death, Visage of Xereus


        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Summon Purple Sun of Shyish 8If successfully cast, set up a Purple Sun of Shyish model wholly within 6" of the caster.
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Empowered by Shyish If your battle is taking place in the Realm of Death, this model can move 12" instead of 9".
        End Given Form After this model has moved, each unit that has any models it passed across, and each other unit that is within 1" of it at the end of its move, is subjected to the Purple Sun’s baleful energies. For each unit subjected to the baleful energies, roll a number of dice equal to the number of models in that unit. For each 6+ one model in that unit is slain. If the unit has Wounds characteristic of 6 or more, it suffers 2D6 mortal wounds instead.
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Predatory The Purple Sun of Shyish is a predatory endless spell. It can move up to 9" and can fly.
        Swirling Death When this model is set up, the player who set it up can immediately make a move with it.
        Visage of Xereus Subtract 1 from the Bravery characteristic of all units while they are within 6" of this model.

    • Realm of Battle

      • Realm of Battle

        Selections: Battle: Shyish

        Categories: Realm of Battle

        Spell: Ethereal Guide, Night's Touch, Soulflay, Soulshroud, Unnatural Darkness, Word of Ending


        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Ethereal Guide 6If successfully cast, add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by the caster until your next hero phase. Malign Sorcery p76
        Night's Touch 8If successfully cast, pick a friendly unit within 6" of the caster that is visible to them. Ignore modifiers (positive and negative) when making save rolls for that unit until your next hero phase. Malign Sorcery p76
        Soulflay 7If successfully cast, pick an enemy HERO within 12" of the caster that is visible to them. That unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. In addition, if the unit suffers 3 mortal wounds from this spell, subtract 2 from its Bravery characteristic until your next hero phase. Malign Sorcery p76
        Soulshroud 6If successfully cast, pick a friendly unit within 12" of the caster that is visible to them. That unit is not affected by other spells until your next hero phase. Malign Sorcery p76
        Unnatural Darkness 6If successfully cast, pick a friendly unit within 12" of the caster that is visible to them. Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target that unit until your next hero phase. Malign Sorcery p76
        Word of Ending 6If successfully cast, pick an enemy HERO within 12" of the caster that is visible to them and roll a dice. If the result is more than the number of wounds allocated to that model, it suffers D3 mortal wounds. Malign Sorcery p76

Force Rules

At the Double: You can use this command ability after you make a run roll for a friendly unit that is within 6" of a friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. If you do so, the run roll is treated as being a 6. (Core Rules p3)

Forward to Victory: You can use this command ability after you make a charge roll for a friendly unit that is within 6" of a friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. If you do so, re-roll the charge roll. (Core Rules p3)

Inspiring Presence: You can use this command ability at the start of the battleshock phase. If you do so, pick a friendly unit that is within 6" of friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. That unit does not have to take battleshock tests in that phase. (Core Rules p3)
